name: Aaron Allen
summary: Full Stack Software Engineer with 9+ years of experience designing, developing, and deploying scalable web and mobile applications. Skilled in React, Angular, React Native, Node.js, and databases such as PostgreSQL and MongoDB, with a strong background in AI/ML integration using Python, FastAPI, and TensorFlow/PyTorch. Experienced in building high-performance, secure, and testable systems, implementing unit, integration, and end-to-end testing, and optimizing application performance through caching, query tuning, and asynchronous processing. Adept at CI/CD automation with GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps, Agile methodologies, and mentoring junior engineers, delivering enterprise-grade solutions in fast-paced environments.

experience.title: Sr. Software Engineer
bullets: Engineered enterprise-grade web platforms using Ruby on Rails for core backend services and React / Angular for modern, responsive frontend experiences.
Designed and maintained Rails-based APIs, implementing RESTful endpoints, service objects, and background workflows using Sidekiq and Redis to support high-volume business operations.
Led data modeling and persistence strategies across PostgreSQL and MongoDB, optimizing ActiveRecord queries, indexes, and transactional boundaries.
Built and deployed AI-powered features using Python, FastAPI, and TensorFlow/PyTorch, integrating predictive analytics and intelligent search into Rails-backed systems.
Implemented comprehensive automated testing using RSpec, Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress, and xUnit, significantly reducing regression issues and improving release stability.
Optimized application performance through caching strategies, asynchronous processing, and database query tuning, improving response times and overall system throughput.
Developed and maintained CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps, enabling automated testing, zero-downtime deployments, and environment-based releases.
Collaborated closely with architects, product managers, and QA teams on system design, code reviews, and architectural decisions to ensure scalable and maintainable solutions.
Mentored junior engineers on Rails best practices, testing strategies, and clean architecture principles within an Agile/Scrum environment.

Wrote unit and integration tests using RSpec, Jest, Mocha, and Chai, improving test coverage and deployment confidence.
Collaborated with designers and stakeholders to translate product requirements into scalable Rails features and intuitive UI components.
Used Docker, Git-based workflows, and CI pipelines to support consistent development environments and reliable deployments.
